node.title: 11 Best Practices For Optimizing Landing Pages
node.description: A landing page is a common asset and standalone web page, created specifically for an advertising or marketing campaign. Itâ€™s where a visitor lands after they click on a link in an email, or from Google, Bing, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, Facebook,  or similar places on the web.
